scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && python -m flake8 && python -m isort --check .
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.type-check: npm run type:backend && npm run type:frontend
scripts.check:frontend: cd frontend && npm run lint && npm run format:check && npm run type-check
scripts.check:backend: cd backend && python -m black --check . && python -m flake8 && python -m isort --check . && python -m mypy .
scripts.check: npm run check:frontend && npm run check:backend
scripts.fix:frontend: cd frontend && npm run format && npm run lint:fix
scripts.fix:backend: cd backend && python -m black . && python -m isort .
scripts.fix: npm run fix:frontend && npm run fix:backend
